title: Angela Rayner – 2021 Comments about Allegra Stratton Laughing About Christmas Party
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Angela Rayner, the Deputy Leader of the Labour Party, on 7 December 2021.
content:
Starting to feel like everyone except me got an invite to the No.10 Christmas parties…
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners

Can’t imagine why they wouldn’t want me at an illegal party held whilst millions of people were separated from their family and friends.
  *[ERSA]: Employment Related Services Association
  *[HS2]: High Speed Two
  *[GPs]: general practitioners
